attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If my money is to be handed over to a political party I want it to be MY decision.  If manufacturers and authors intend to donate some of their profits which are derived from the money I pay to purchase their products then I want the choice, before I finalise the purchase, to consider if I am prepared to allow my money to be given to them.  I believe, strongly, that I am entitled to the Human Right to self determination regarding where the money I hand over to anybody, goes.
